    level="1"
    right="Item 2"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Oil of Potency](/Equipment.aspx?ID=179)
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Consumable" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=36" />
<trait label="Magical" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=103" />
<trait label="Oil" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=121" />
<trait label="Transmutation" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=157" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 562 <sup>4.0</sup></row>

**Price** 7 gp

<row gap="medium">

**Usage** held in 2 hands

**Bulk** L
</row>

<row gap="medium">
<row gap="tiny"><row>**Activate**</row><actions string="Single Action" /><row>Interact</row></row>

 

 

 
</row>

</column>

---

When you apply this thick, viscous oil to a weapon or suit of armor, that item immediately becomes magically potent. If the item is a weapon, it temporarily becomes a _+1 [striking](/Equipment.aspx?ID=280) weapon_, or, if it's armor, it temporarily becomes _+1 [resilient](/Equipment.aspx?ID=279) armor_. This lasts for 1 minute.

<column gap="tiny">

</column>
